title: Hexakill TwistedTreeline Boring
body: This...Is...So...Boring. Please, Riot make a gamemode that changes the overall gameplay. You have made about 3 hexakills now. the first time it came out was perfectly fun. The second time, Meh. This time, holy shit, make something else. Bring back Urf or something that was actually fun. This just adds another character instead of make the gameplay intense like Urf was or other gamemodes. Please for the love of god make urf a permanent gamemode.

replies.body:
Riot creates a gamemode that was requested ever since an exploit allowed 6v6 on the Twisted Treeline.

Gets nothing but complaints.

> Riot creates a gamemode that was requested ever since an exploit allowed 6v6 on the Twisted Treeline.
> 
> Gets nothing but complaints.

No bans, no special buff to make 6v6 flow well, no level 3 start(There's a reason they do this on dominion), kats and AOE CC mages with woogles dominate just about everything else.

They half assed this as much as possible.
Because you lose at champion select and SR has conditioned everyone to be passively useless and terrible at constant low level teamfights.

Or make an event, fun. 


There's literally no change in ANYTHING for this Harrowing this blows.
It really does, I am like literally dying of boredom whilst playing this gamemode. Back to summoners rift... *Sigh* {{champion:26}}  I knew you would do that...Make this gamemode.

> dying of boredom 
 
> Back to summoners rift...

Hahahahahahaha
